Description: Sandal for the right foot, made of woven reed and palm leaves and papyrus, complete with upper, ankle and toe straps remaining, toe pointed.
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN405621001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum
Bibliographic references: Veldmeijer 2009b / Studies of ancient Egyptian footwear. Technological aspects. Part XII. Fibre shoes (99-100, 102, 106, 110, fig.2d)
